name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a results-driven Senior QA Engineer, I possess extensive expertise in **QA**, **SaaS**, and **API Testing**, utilizing tools like **Postman**, **Cypress**, and **Playwright** for thorough **automated testing** and **regression testing**. I have a solid foundation in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Python**, which enhances my ability to collaborate with development teams and ensure high-quality software delivery. Additionally, my experience with **OAuth** and **webhooks** enables seamless integration across platforms.

With 8 years of experience as a Full Stack Developer, I have successfully built high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors, leveraging a diverse tech stack including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I also bring a strong understanding of mobile testing for both **iOS** and **Android**, along with hands-on experience in documenting tests and communicating with cross-functional teams. My focus on compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS complements my capabilities in delivering secure and reliable applications.
